summary: Added Step 2.7 to /todo command that automatically completes expanded tasks when all subtasks reach terminal status. Updated dry-run and final output sections to report auto-completed tasks. Added comprehensive Notes documentation for the feature.

artifacts.summary: Added Step 2.7 (auto-complete expanded tasks), updated Steps 4 and 7 output, added Notes subsection

completion_data.completion_summary: Added automatic completion of expanded tasks to /todo command. Step 2.7 detects expanded tasks with all subtasks in terminal status and transitions them to completed. Updated output sections and Notes documentation.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Updated .claude/commands/todo.md with Step 2.7, dry-run output, final output, and Notes documentation for auto-completion of expanded tasks

next_steps: Run /todo to test the new auto-completion functionality with expanded tasks
